posts.title: ep. 54: Intentional Exploration to Navigate Career Transitions
posts.description: How to use intentional exploration to understand new landscapes in your career, such as when moving from enterprise AR hardware to creator tools for designers and artists building AR experiences.

posts.title: ep. 53: Designing Future Systems
posts.description: Exploring how to design technology where we can harness 'the machines' while retaining our human agency, and how systems thinking is essential for future-proofing careers.

posts.title: ep. 52: Systems Thinking as Career Future-Proofing
posts.description: How AI is redefining craft for knowledge workers, shifting roles towards big-picture orchestration and why systems thinking is essential for future-proofing careers.

posts.title: ep. 51: Thriving in Emerging Tech - Series Kickoff: XR Career Spotlight with Design Leader Jordan Harvey
posts.description: How industry practitioners can break into the field of extended reality to successfully navigate this evolving space, featuring insights from Jordan Harvey of Remote Control.

posts.title: Design Research at the Speed of AI
posts.description: How we're accelerating design research for XR, AI, and robotics products using neuroscience-backed evaluation frameworks.

posts.title: Evaluating Cognitive Load in XR Experiences
posts.description: Understanding how to measure and optimize cognitive load in virtual and augmented reality applications.

posts.title: The Future of Human-Robot Interaction Design
posts.description: Exploring the unique challenges and opportunities in designing interfaces for robotic systems.

posts.title: Building Evaluation Frameworks That Scale
posts.description: How to create design research frameworks that grow with your product and team.

posts.title: Neuroscience in Product Design
posts.description: Applying neuroscience principles to create more intuitive and effective user experiences.
